channel.title: How do i make range and mage work against other players? pk?
channel.description: Well the only thing that works is the C bow, and its an instant kill. Also, mage doesn't work on "players" at all only npcs. Range on my server doesn't work in general. So how do I start on fixing this problem

edit the item bonuses in item.cfg, so c bow doesnt 1 hit.
I cant help you fix the mage problem unless i saw your client.java, and i dont feel like downloading shit and coding other peoples server atm…
